"Nel! Help Rhett!" You shout, already producing a potion from your UI. "Tatsumaki, Vision! On my target!"

"I'm going!" Nel replies. For a bit, as he jumps back, he's cloaked in a blue light; then, it fades, and he transcends the impending danger, moving toward Rhett and leaving shimmering after-images in his path.

You throw back the potion, noting a faint, heady flavor. Aside from that sensation, it doesn't taste like most of anything, or even feel like you're really swallowing any liquid.

> [[ Ascheritt: 23 / 24 HP ]]

With a sickening crack, your ankle bends back into place, and bands of rubbery flesh reach across the bloodied gap to close the wound, leaving nothing more than a small gash. Then, you ready your sword, as the crawler is upon you.

> Try to strike first.
> Defend, and keep its attention while Tatsumaki and Vision deal the damage.
